attributes.review:
So i got this app to support our beloved orange Cheeto 🤩🍊everything was going fine but things started getting very strange.At first when I got the app it was very normal, but then it started to get VERY slow Just like our orange bunker boi 🍊🍊After this, well I went to walk my 🐠 and eat some toothpaste and foil for lunch, when I saw a trump FLAG right in front of me,I got very scared so I just started running for my life.I got away from it, but it didn’t end there,I saw a “trump 2020” shirt laying on the ground,I pick it up and the size of the shirt was (XS, just as the size of our racist Cheeto brain 🧠) it was strange since it wasn’t my size so ig it couldn’t be for me.But then my fish started going crazy he started saying some weird things like “trump 2020” I was very scared bc I had raise my pet very well, my fish started moving weird like if it was getting short of air and still screaming “Trump 2020” when sadly he stopped moving 🤧. This app KILLED and 
POSSES my poor fish . I want justice for my fish.🤬😭
attributes.title: MY FISH DIED 😭
